dict.acceptation: 享有，享受；欣赏；喜欢；使过得快活；

sent.orig: Enjoy! (Note: I refer to Heathcliff a few times, he's my cat).
sent.trans: Enjoy!（注意：下面我多次提到的Heathcliff,是我的宠物老虎）。

sent.orig: Enjoy; these things, too, are part of your education as a Unix programmer.
sent.trans: Enjoy（享受）;这个过程，也是作为一个Unix程序员的收获。

sent.orig: I enjoy speaking English!I enjoy losing face!I enjoy being successful!
sent.trans: 我喜欢说英语，我喜欢丢脸，我喜欢成功。

sent.orig: Most Anglo-Americans enjoy entertaining at home, but they don't enjoy stuffy, formal dinners.
sent.trans: 大部分英美人士喜爱居家宴乐，而不喜欢沉闷的正式晚宴。

sent.orig: Just as the French people enjoy their wine, so the British enjoy their beer.
sent.trans: 美国人喜欢喝啤酒就如法国人嗜葡萄酒一样。
